peregrine.os
Class MappedFileWriter

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.util.IdempotentFunction<java.lang.Object,java.io.IOException>
      peregrine.util.IdempotentCloser
          peregrine.os.BaseMappedFile
              peregrine.os.MappedFileWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, ChannelBufferWritable
public class MappedFileWriter
extends BaseMappedFile
implements java.io.Closeable, ChannelBufferWritable

Facade around a MappedByteBuffer but we also support mlock on the mapped pages, and closing all dependent resources.
